description: This file is a unit test for the TextReader class, testing its ability to read lines from a text fragment.

classes.name: TextReader
classes.description: A class responsible for reading text data, likely from a data element or fragment.

classes.name: DataElement
classes.description: A class representing a data element containing text or binary data.

classes.name: TextFragment
classes.description: A class representing a fragment of text obtained from the TextReader.

methods.name: Reset
methods.description: Resets the TextReader to its initial state.

methods.name: ReadLine
methods.description: Reads a line of text from the TextReader.
